verses.verse: Then the men <S%H376><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%> to us, not calling <S%H7121><s%> us when <S%H3588><s%> you went <S%H1980><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against Midian <S%H4080><s%>?" And they contended <S%H7378><s%> with him vigorously. <S%H2394><s%>

But he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "What <S%H4100><s%> have I done <S%H6213><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> in comparison with you? Is not the gleaning <S%H5955><s%> [of the grapes] of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the vintage <S%H1210><s%> of Abiezer <S%H44><s%>?

"God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> the leaders <S%H8269><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%> Oreb <S%H6159><s%> and Zeeb <S%H2062><s%> into your hands; <S%H3027><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> was I able <S%H3201><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> in comparison with you?" Then <S%H227><s%> their anger <S%H7307><s%> toward <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> him subsided <S%H7503><s%> when he said <S%H1696><s%> that.

Then Gideon <S%H1439><s%> and the <S%H300><s%> men <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were with him came <S%H935><s%> to the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> [and] crossed <S%H5674><s%> over, <S%H5674><s%> weary <S%H5889><s%> yet pursuing. <S%H7291><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to the men <S%H376><s%> of Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> loaves <S%H3603><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are following <S%H7272><s%> me, for they are weary, <S%H5889><s%> and I am pursuing <S%H7291><s%> Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna, <S%H6759><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Midian. <S%H4080><s%>"

And the leaders <S%H8269><s%> of Succoth <S%H5523><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Are the hands <S%H3709><s%> of Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> already <S%H6258><s%> in your hands, <S%H3027><s%> that we should give <S%H5414><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> to your army <S%H6635><s%>?"

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "All right, <S%H3651><s%> when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> into my hand, <S%H3027><s%> then I will thrash <S%H1758><s%> your bodies <S%H1320><s%> with the thorns <S%H6975><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and with briers. <S%H1303><s%>"

And he went <S%H5927><s%> up from there <S%H8033><s%> to Penuel, <S%H6439><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> similarly <S%H2088><s%> to them; and the men <S%H376><s%> of Penuel <S%H6439><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> him just <S%H9201><s%> as the men <S%H376><s%> of Succoth <S%H5523><s%> had answered. <S%H6030><s%>

So he spoke <S%H559><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> to the men <S%H376><s%> of Penuel, <S%H6439><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "When I return <S%H7725><s%> safely, <S%H7965><s%> I will tear <S%H5422><s%> down <S%H5422><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> tower. <S%H4026><s%>"

Now Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> were in Karkor, <S%H7174><s%> and their armies <S%H4264><s%> with them, about 15000 men, all <S%H3605><s%> who were left <S%H3498><s%> of the entire <S%H3605><s%> army <S%H4264><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the east; <S%H6924><s%> for the fallen <S%H5307><s%> were 120000 swordsmen <S%H376><s%>. <S%H8025><s%> <S%H2719><s%>

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up by the way <S%H1870><s%> of those who lived <S%H7931><s%> in tents <S%H168><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> of Nobah <S%H5025><s%> and Jogbehah, <S%H3011><s%> and attacked <S%H5221><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> when the camp <S%H4264><s%> was unsuspecting. <S%H983><s%>

When Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> fled, <S%H5127><s%> he pursued <S%H7291><s%> them and captured <S%H3920><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%> Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna, <S%H6759><s%> and routed <S%H2729><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> army. <S%H4264><s%>
Then Gideon <S%H1439><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joash <S%H3060><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> from the battle <S%H4421><s%> by the ascent <S%H4608><s%> of Heres. <S%H2776><s%>

And he captured <S%H3920><s%> a youth <S%H5288><s%> from Succoth <S%H5523><s%> and questioned <S%H7592><s%> him. Then [the youth] wrote <S%H3789><s%> down <S%H3789><s%> for him the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Succoth <S%H5523><s%> and its elders, <S%H2205><s%> seventy-seven men. <S%H376><s%>

And he came <S%H935><s%> to the men <S%H376><s%> of Succoth <S%H5523><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold <S%H2009><s%> Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna, <S%H6759><s%> concerning whom <S%H834><s%> you taunted <S%H2778><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Are the hands <S%H3709><s%> of Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> already <S%H6258><s%> in your hand, <S%H3027><s%> that we should give <S%H5414><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> to your men <S%H376><s%> who are weary <S%H3287><s%>?'"

And he took <S%H3947><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and thorns <S%H6975><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and briers, <S%H1303><s%> and he disciplined <S%H3045><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Succoth <S%H5523><s%> with them.
And he tore <S%H5422><s%> down <S%H5422><s%> the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Penuel <S%H6439><s%> and killed <S%H2026><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna, <S%H6759><s%> "What <S%H375><s%> kind <S%H375><s%> of men <S%H376><s%> [were] they whom <S%H834><s%> you killed <S%H2026><s%> at Tabor <S%H8396><s%>?" And they said, <S%H559><s%> "They were like <S%H3644><s%> you, each one <S%H259><s%> resembling <S%H8389><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of a king. <S%H4428><s%>"

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "They [were] my brothers, <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of my mother. <S%H517><s%> [As] the Lord <S%H3068><s%> lives, <S%H2416><s%> if <S%H3863><s%> only <S%H3863><s%> you had let them live, <S%H2421><s%> I would not kill <S%H2026><s%> you."

So he said <S%H559><s%> to Jether <S%H3500><s%> his first-born, "Rise, <S%H6965><s%> kill <S%H2026><s%> them." But the youth <S%H5288><s%> did not draw <S%H8025><s%> his sword, <S%H2719><s%> for he was afraid, <S%H3372><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he was still <S%H5750><s%> a youth. <S%H5288><s%>

Then Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Rise <S%H6965><s%> up yourself, <S%H859><s%> and fall <S%H6293><s%> on us; for as the man, <S%H376><s%> so is his strength. <S%H1369><s%>" So Gideon <S%H1439><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> and killed <S%H2026><s%> Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna, <S%H6759><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the crescent <S%H7720><s%> ornaments <S%H7720><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were on their camels' necks. <S%H6677><s%>

Then the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Gideon, <S%H1439><s%> "Rule <S%H4910><s%> over us, both <S%H1571><s%> you and your son, <S%H1121><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%>'s son, for you have delivered <S%H3467><s%> us from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Midian. <S%H4080><s%>"

But Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "I will not rule <S%H4910><s%> over you, nor <S%H3808><s%> shall my son <S%H1121><s%> rule <S%H4910><s%> over you; the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall rule <S%H4910><s%> over you."

Yet Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "I would request <S%H7596><s%> <S%H7592><s%> of you, that each <S%H376><s%> of you give <S%H5414><s%> me an earring <S%H5141><s%> from his spoil. <S%H7998><s%>" (For they had gold <S%H2091><s%> earrings, <S%H5141><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they were Ishmaelites. <S%H3459><s%>)

And they said, <S%H559><s%> "We will surely <S%H5414><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> [them.]" So they spread <S%H6566><s%> out a garment, <S%H8071><s%> and every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> of them threw <S%H7993><s%> an earring <S%H5141><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> from his spoil. <S%H7998><s%>

And the weight <S%H4948><s%> of the gold <S%H2091><s%> earrings <S%H5141><s%> that he requested <S%H7592><s%> was 1700 [shekels] of gold, <S%H2091><s%> besides <S%H905><s%> <S%H4480><s%> the crescent <S%H7720><s%> ornaments <S%H7720><s%> and the pendants <S%H5188><s%> and the purple <S%H713><s%> robes <S%H899><s%> which <S%H7945><s%> [were] on the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%> and besides <S%H905><s%> <S%H4480><s%> the neck <S%H6060><s%> bands <S%H6060><s%> that [were] on their camels' necks. <S%H6677><s%>

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> it into an ephod, <S%H646><s%> and placed <S%H3322><s%> it in his city, <S%H5892><s%> Ophrah, <S%H6084><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> with it there, <S%H8033><s%> so that it became <S%H1961><s%> a snare <S%H4170><s%> to Gideon <S%H1439><s%> and his household. <S%H1004><s%>

So Midian <S%H4080><s%> was subdued <S%H3665><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and they did not lift <S%H5375><s%> up their heads <S%H7218><s%> anymore. <S%H3254><s%> And the land <S%H776><s%> was undisturbed <S%H8252><s%> for forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Gideon. <S%H1439><s%>
Then Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joash <S%H3060><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and lived <S%H3427><s%> in his own house. <S%H1004><s%>

Now Gideon <S%H1439><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> who were his direct <S%H3409><s%> descendants, <S%H3318><s%> for he had <S%H1961><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> wives. <S%H802><s%>

And his concubine <S%H6370><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was in Shechem <S%H7927><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> him a son, <S%H1121><s%> and he named <S%H8034><s%> <S%H7760><s%> him Abimelech. <S%H40><s%>

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joash <S%H3060><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> at a ripe <S%H2896><s%> old <S%H7872><s%> age <S%H7872><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in the tomb <S%H6913><s%> of his father Joash, <S%H1><s%> in Ophrah <S%H3060><s%> of the Abiezrites. <S%H6084><s%>

Then it came <S%H1961><s%> about, as soon <S%H9201><s%> as Gideon <S%H1439><s%> was dead, <S%H4191><s%> that the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> with the Baals, <S%H1168><s%> and made <S%H7760><s%> Baal-berith their god. <S%H430><s%>

Thus the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did not remember <S%H2142><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> who had delivered <S%H5337><s%> them from the hands <S%H3027><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> their enemies <S%H340><s%> on every <S%H5439><s%> side; <S%H5439><s%>

nor <S%H3808><s%> did they show <S%H6213><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> to the household <S%H1004><s%> of Jerubbaal <S%H3378><s%> ([that is,] Gideon <S%H1439><s%>), in accord with all <S%H3605><s%> the good <S%H9186><s%> that he had done <S%H6213><s%> to Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
